mapper.select: /* 상품 목록 조회 */ SELECT goods_code , goods_name , goods_company , goods_category , goods_price , goods_reg_id , goods_reg_date , goods_update_id , goods_update_date FROM goods_reg_info ORDER BY CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(goods_code, 'goods', -1) AS UNSIGNED) DESC;

/* 특정 상품 조회 */ SELECT goods_code , goods_name , goods_company , goods_category , goods_price , goods_reg_id , goods_reg_date , goods_update_id , goods_update_date FROM goods_reg_info WHERE goods_code = #{goodsCode};
